publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1595 Mr Gil Paterson: 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network—That the Parliament believes that the work carried out by the Scottish Rape Crisis Network provides an essential service to victims of rape, sexual assault and child sexual abuse, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to provide enough funding to enable the continuation of the Network including the funding of an 0800 number which would link victims directly to the Scottish Rape Crisis Network.

S1M-1595 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network (lodged on 26 January 2001) Fergus Ewing*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Fiona McLeod*, Shona Robison*
S1M-1595 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network (lodged on 26 January 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Michael Matheson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Russell*
S1M-1595 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network (lodged on 26 January 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-1595 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network (lodged on 26 January 2001) Alex Neil*, Cathy Peattie*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1595 Mr Gil Paterson: 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network—That the Parliament believes that the work carried out by the Scottish Rape Crisis Network provides an essential service to victims of rape, sexual assault and child sexual abuse, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to provide enough funding to enable the continuation of the Network including the funding of an 0800 number which would link victims directly to the Scottish Rape Crisis Network. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Ms Margo MacDonald, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fiona McLeod, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Michael Matheson, Nora Radcliffe, Michael Russell, Donald Gorrie, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Neil, Cathy Peattie, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1595 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network (lodged on 26 January 2001) Robin Harper*, Christine Grahame*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1595 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network (lodged on 26 January 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-1595 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network (lodged on 26 January 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-1595 0800 Number for the Scottish Rape Crisis Network (lodged on 26 January 2001) Brian Adam*
